commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Finally, it's reopening day!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm nervous, but I'll do my best! Rina-chan Board says, "Serious!"

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: The owner's wife said she would be stopping by to check in on us later today, but for the most part, we will be cooking and serving the customers on our own.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Let's work together, put our best feet forward, and make day one a success.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, you're right. The manager and staff are all counting on us. We've gotta do our best for them.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It's almost time to open shop! Get your game faces on!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Welcome! Will that be a seat for one?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Have a seat at the counter. I'll bring your water and a hand towel shortly.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Please call me over once you've decided on your order.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Thank you for waiting, here's your green pepper steak... Huh? That wasn't what you ordered? I-I'm sorry, that was my mistake!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Pardon me, will the chili shrimp and mapo tofu be done soon? The customer was wondering how much longer...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sorry, it'll be a bit longer! Oh, but the crab omelet over rice is done. Could you take that out with you?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Phew, that's a lunch rush for you. The customers just keep coming one right after another. This is a little much to handle!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Oh, new order! One soy sauce ramen, one chop-suey rice bowl, and two orders of potstickers!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: There are so many customers here, but we've gotta keep it up! No matter how hard it gets, we've gotta get through this for the restaurant's sake!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Thank you! Come again!

commands.speaker: Rin, Kanan, Dia, Ayumu, Rina
commands.line: Huh?!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Come on, guys! You can't have a good meal without a big smile! Let's see those pearly whites!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: No matter how tasty the food is, it'll taste awful if we serve it with a frown. To get happy customers, we have to show them happy faces!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: You're right. The best restaurants are filled with brilliant smiles.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: All right, everyone. Smiles on for our next big rush!

commands.speaker: Ayumu, Rina, Rin, Kanan
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: *Sigh* We're fiiiiinally done.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: That lunch rush was practically a stampede. I would never have even imagined it could get that busy. My arms are still trembling from draining water off the noodles.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: But the customers were happy with our service. Thank you, everyone. And you were super cool about the whole thing, Honoka!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You mean her, "Thank you, come again!" stunt? It was certainly shocking, but it was just the jolt back to reality we needed. Only Honoka could pull that off.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh, it was nothing! *Giggle* I kinda figured something like this might happen, so I wound up pickin' Kotori's brain about it a bit.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: What does Kotori have to do with this?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Don't tell me... All that stuff about happy faces bringing happy customers was just parroted from Kotori, wasn't it?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Uh, er... *Laugh* Uh, maaaybe?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: *Sigh* So that's where it came from.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: We'll have to thank Kotori for that later.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Come on, Honoka. Quit standing around and help us clean.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: What?! Guys, why'd you all turn cold on me?!

commands.speaker: Rin, Ayumu, Rina, Kanan, Dia
commands.line: Hahaha!
